short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The game-changing wallet for Conla network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Conla Wallet is a user-friendly cryptocurrency wallet designed to keep your digital assets safe. Easily store, send, and receive cryptocurrencies with top-notch security features.

Conla wallet key features:
1. Send and receive token with custom fees on a friendly UI
2. Sponsoring Transactions Using Paymasters
3. Connect to mutiple dApps with ease
